unnormalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, 'cause the Indian automotive scene is sizzling with fresh launches!
normalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian automotive scene is sizzling with fresh launches!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the bomb – the all-new 'Scorpio N Adventure Edition' hitting showrooms near you! Expect even more ruggedness and off-roading capabilities, perfect for those Leh-Ladakh trips. Price reveal coming soon!
normalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the bomb – the all-new 'Scorpio N Adventure Edition' hitting showrooms near you! Expect even more ruggedness and off-roading capabilities, perfect for those Leh-Ladakh trips. Price reveal coming soon!

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors is teasing something electric – rumors point to the 'Punch EV' with a promised range of 300+ km. Dr. Sharma from ARAI was spotted checking it out; whispers say its cabin space rivals a 2 BHK flat (well, almost!), approx. 600 sq ft equivalent.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors is teasing something electric – rumors point to the 'Punch E V' with a promised range of three hundred plus kilometer. Doctor Sharma from A R A I was spotted checking it out; whispers say its cabin space rivals a two B H K flat (well, almost!), approximately six hundred square feet equivalent.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki has launched a souped-up version of the 'Brezza' with new colour options and enhanced safety features. Expect to shell out Rs. 8 Lakhs onwards. Perfect for cruising in style during Diwali celebrations!
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki has launched a souped-up version of the 'Brezza' with new colour options and enhanced safety features. Expect to shell out rupees eight lakh onwards. Perfect for cruising in style during Diwali celebrations!

unnormalised: Finally, a little birdie tells us Hyundai is planning to unveil a facelifted 'Creta' around Republic Day. Keep your eyes peeled for leaked images and videos! It's a launch bonanza, folks! Which one are you eyeing?
normalised: Finally, a little birdie tells us Hyundai is planning to unveil a facelifted 'Creta' around Republic Day. Keep your eyes peeled for leaked images and videos! It's a launch bonanza, folks! Which one are you eyeing?
